title: PMS 2.0 262 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Jared Allen, Darius Butler, Steve Mariucci, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's the show, Pat and the boys look ahead to tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Jets and Broncos and welcome in a few great guests. First, 9 year NFL DB, co-host of The Man-To-Man Pod, everything DB, Darius Butler joins the program. Pat and Darius chat about tonight's game, Darius gives another betting lock for QB passing yardage totals, and chats about the Lakers v. Heat series (22:59 - 44:11). Next, 5x Pro Bowler, 4x All-Pro, 2x NFL sacks leader, former pass rusher for the Chiefs, Vikings, Bears, and Panthers, Jared Allen joins the show. Pat and Jared chat about what he's been doing since retirement with his foundation, the different intricacies of pass rushing, and much more in a hilarious conversation (50:15-1:15:29). Lastly, in another installment of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk, Pat and AJ are joined by former Head Coach of the 49ers and Lions, and current Analyst for the NFL Network, Steve Mariucci joins the program. Pat, Mooch, and AJ chat about everything going on in the NFL, what it's like being a Head Coach in the NFL and moving all the time, his thoughts on the turf situation at MetLife, doing his pregame show from home, and much more (1:15:31-1:39:12). Subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we close in on 1 million subscribers and a $100,000 giveaway, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
